title: Verify npm tarball is clean — no test files in package
description: Previous cycle found test files leaking into npm tarball. tsconfig.build.json and .npmignore fixes were applied. Verify: (1) npm run build, (2) npm pack --dry-run — should show ~30 files, no __tests__ dirs, no .test. files, no source maps. (3) Run package-validation.test.ts. Report exact file count and size.
acceptance_criteria: npm pack --dry-run shows zero test files, zero source maps. Package validation tests pass. File count and size documented.
